word_group.brief_definition: 非法监禁；非法拘留；私禁

bilingual.source: He was sentenced to life imprisonment for murder.
bilingual.target: 他因谋杀罪被判终身监禁。

bilingual.source: The court sentenced the rapist to life imprisonment.
bilingual.target: 法庭判处强奸犯终身监禁。

bilingual.source: He was sentenced to life imprisonment for rape and kill.
bilingual.target: 他因奸杀罪被判终身监禁。

bilingual.source: The judge sentenced him to imprisonment for his crimes.
bilingual.target: 法官因他的罪行判处他监禁。

bilingual.source: The rapist was sentenced to life imprisonment by the court.
bilingual.target: 法院判处强奸犯终身监禁。

bilingual.source: The court awarded him damages for wrongful imprisonment.
bilingual.target: 法院因不正当监禁判给他赔偿。

bilingual.source: They were sentenced to life imprisonment without parole.
bilingual.target: 他们被判刑终身监禁，不得假释。

bilingual.source: The court sentenced him to life imprisonment for matricide.
bilingual.target: 法院因杀母罪判处他终身监禁。

bilingual.source: The new law freed many people from unjust imprisonment.
bilingual.target: 新法律释放了许多被不公正监禁的人。

bilingual.source: Theft is a serious crime that can lead to imprisonment.
bilingual.target: 偷窃是一种严重的犯罪行为，可能会导致监禁。

yingyinNormal.en: The court sentences the accused, Schmitz, to imprisonment for life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 本庭判处主犯施密茨终身监禁。

yingyinNormal.en: The executive can't legislate, can't receive appropriations, can't sentence people to imprisonment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 行政机关不能立法，不能接受拨款，不能判人入监。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Any such heretics that continued to spread these lies were to be punished by <highlight>imprisonment</highlight> or even death.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 任何继续传播这些谎言的异教徒都将受到监禁甚至死刑的惩罚。

examination_example.sentence: The humiliations of his father's <highlight>imprisonment</highlight> and his labor in the blacking factory formed Dickens's greatest wound and became his deepest secret.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 父亲入狱及黑鞋油厂打工经历所带来的羞辱给狄更斯造成了最大的伤痛，成了他心底最深的秘密。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 囚犯；拘留犯；羁押犯；战俘；俘虏；遭非法囚禁者；失去自由的人；陷入困境之人
